comments.raw_text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

I was Using my Gmail with https extension.


Actual results:

I close my browser without logout from Gmail,Again i opened the Firefox and try to restore.Instead of login page it has redirect me to My Inbox.


Expected results:

It should asked the Password.
comments.creator: chowdharyajit86@yahoo.com
comments.text:
User Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 5.1; rv:5.0) Gecko/20100101 Firefox/5.0
Build ID: 20110615151330

Steps to reproduce:

I was Using my Gmail with https extension.


Actual results:

I close my browser without logout from Gmail,Again i opened the Firefox and try to restore.Instead of login page it has redirect me to My Inbox.


Expected results:

It should asked the Password.
comments.author: chowdharyajit86@yahoo.com

comments.raw_text:
That's done by Google, using a cookie. The browser really does not log you in all on its own.

The fact that you used https has nothing to do with it.
comments.author: jo.hermans@gmail.com
